product_name: REI Caper Peak Microfleece Jacket - Toddler Boys'
long_description: With cozy fabric and eye-catching details, the REI Caper Peak microfleece jacket snuggles your toddler in warmth and style for playing outside in cool weather. Lightweight, non-pilling microfleece insulates, breathes and dries quickly; brushed interior feels soft against the skin. Shaped, three-panel hood adds warmth and offers a great fit. Full-length zipper; two hand pockets; two snap-closure chest pockets.
short_description: With cozy fabric and eye-catching details, the REI Caper Peak microfleece jacket snuggles your toddler in warmth and style for playing outside in cool weather.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Infants And Toddlers
product_group: Infants And Toddlers Fleece Jackets And Pants
